r.d: This extension allows php applications to communicate with any Stomp compliant Message Brokers through easy object oriented and procedural interfaces.
r.n: - Adding .travis.yml to enable Travis CI test runner. (Gennady) - Adding a basic README file. (Gennady) - Check stomp connection status after _stomp_recv. (Gennady) - Commenting out activemq.prefetchSize hardcoded header for SUBSCRIBE frame. (Gennady) - Make login and passcode headers optional (if no creds provided). (Gennady) - Fixing type cast warning, introduced a new int variable. (Gennady) - Fixing stomp_writable() check so we can catch when connect failed. (Gennady)
